mapper.sql: so.ID, so.PARENT_ID, so.ORGANIZATION_NAME, so.PARENT_IDS, so.DEL_FLAG, so.ORGANIZATION_LEVEL, so.THIRD_ORG, so.ADDRESS_DETAIL, so.PRINCIPAL, so.PHONE, so.SORT, so.REGION_LAST_CODE, so.ADDRESS_LAST_CODE, SO.longitude, SO.latitude
mapper.select:
select so.ID, so.ORGANIZATION_NAME ORGNAME, so.ADDRESS_LAST_CODE, sr.REGION_CODE, sr.REGION_NAME, sr.PARENT_IDS, sr.PARENT_NAMES from SYS_ORG so left join SYS_REGION sr on so.ADDRESS_LAST_CODE=sr.REGION_CODE
and so.ORGANIZATION_NAME like '%' || #{organizationName} || '%'
and SO.ID in
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.PARENT_IDS||'/' || a.ID PARENT_IDS from SYS_ORG a where a.id in
#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_ORG set PARENT_IDS = replace(PARENT_IDS,#{oldParentIdsPrefix},#{newParentIdsPrefix}) where id in
#{id}
mapper.sql: a.ID, a.PARENT_ID, a.ORGANIZATION_NAME, a.PARENT_IDS, a.DEL_FLAG, a.ORGANIZATION_LEVEL, a.THIRD_ORG, a.ADDRESS_DETAIL, a.PRINCIPAL, a.PHONE, a.SORT, a.REGION_LAST_CODE, a.ADDRESS_LAST_CODE, a.longitude, a.latitude
